uk.ac.manchester.cs.patelt9.twitter.data
Interface DatabaseConnector

All Known Implementing Classes:
MongoConnector, SqlConnector
public interface DatabaseConnector

All database connectors must implement this interface. Allows high level abstraction of database tasks.

Author:
Tariq Patel

Method Summary
 void close()
          Close all database connections
 int deleteAll()
          Delete all rows in the database

          Delete a given tweet by its id

          Update a tweet's sentiment where sentiment is neutral
 int updateSentiment(long id, java.lang.String sentiment, java.lang.String score)
          Update a tweet's sentiment where sentiment is positive or negative and has a score
